ComicInfo.Summary:
NEW STORY ARC
Spencer Dales has one purpose: tear down the Aegis and free everyone under their “protection.” However, with his closest ally in prison and the Tenth looking to put Spence in an adjoining cell, creating a better future won’t be easy. But it needs to happen NOW.
Skybound’s most sensational series of 2019 returns to remind readers: Excellence is Real.
*List of covers and their creators:* | Cover | Name | Creator(s) | Sidebar Location | |-------|-------------------------------|----------------------------|------------------| | A | Cover A | Khary Randolph | 1 | | B | Visions of Excellence Cover B | Chris Brunner & Rico Renzi | 2 |
ComicInfo.Title: Seven: Multitudes
